scripts.install:all: npm run install:front & npm run install:auth & npm run install:product & npm run install:facturation & npm run install:config
scripts.generate:auth: cd auth-service && npx prisma migrate dev --name "Setup auth db"
scripts.seed:auth: cd auth-service && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:auth: npm run generate:auth && npm run seed:auth
scripts.generate:product: cd product-service && npx prisma migrate dev --name "Setup product db"
scripts.seed:product: cd product-service && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:product: npm run generate:product && npm run seed:product
scripts.generate:facturation: cd facturation-service && npx prisma migrate dev --name "Setup facturation db"
scripts.seed:facturation: cd facturation-service && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:facturation: npm run generate:facturation && npm run seed:facturation
scripts.generate:config: cd config-service && npx prisma migrate dev --name "Setup config db"
scripts.db:all: npm run db:auth && npm run db:product && npm run db:facturation && npm run db:config
scripts.start:prod: npm run start:front & npm run start:auth-prod & npm run start:product-prod & npm run start:facturation-prod  & npm run start:config-prod
scripts.start:dev: npm run start:front & npm run start:auth-dev & npm run start:product-dev & npm run start:facturation-dev & npm run start:config-dev
